channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: How To Survive Anything – The Life Story of David and Yetta Kane

item.title: By: ElaineAsh
item.dc:creator: ElaineAsh
item.description: <strong>Cutie: This is so sweet of</strong><br />Cutie: This is so sweet of you to review HOW TO SURVIVE ANYTHING. I am David and Yetta's editor, and on their behalf, warmly thank you for the kind comments. More comments from us soon! Fondly, Elaine
item.content:encoded:
Cutie: This is so sweet of
Cutie: This is so sweet of you to review HOW TO SURVIVE ANYTHING. I am David and Yetta’s editor, and on their behalf, warmly thank you for the kind comments. More comments from us soon! Fondly, Elaine
